Translations.Text: Surely, human has been created very impatient
when the evil touches them, they are distressed
but when good (fortune) touches them, they are stingy
except those who devote to prayers
those who remain steadfast in their prayers
those who set aside a known right in their wealth
for the beggar who asks and for the deprived (who lost property and wealth)
those who believe in the Day of recompense
those who fear the punishment of their Lord
surely! The punishment of their Lord is that before which none can feel secure
those who guard their chastity (private parts from illegal sex)
except with their wives or those whom their right hands possess so they are not to be blamed
But those who seek to go beyond this, then it is those who are transgressors
And those who keep their trusts and their covenants
and those who stand firm in their testimonies
and those who guard their prayers well
it is they who will be in the gardens (Paradise) with honor
So what is the matter with the disbelievers that they hasten to listen from you (O Muhammad)
sitting in groups on the right and on the left (of you, O Muhammad)
Does every one of them seek to enter the Paradise of delight
But nay! Surely, We have created them out of that which they (disbelievers) know
So, I (Muhammad) swear by the Lord of all points of sunrise in the east and sunset in the west that surely We are Able (to destroy them)
and can replace them by others better than them; and We are not to be outrun
So, leave them to plunge in vain talk and play about, until they meet their Day which they are promised
The Day when they will come out of the graves quickly as if they are racing towards a goal
with their eyes lowered in fear and humility, covering them with disgrace! That is the Day which they are promised
Surely, We sent Noah to his people (saying): “Warn your people before there comes to them a painful punishment.”
He said: “O my people! Surely, I am sent to you as a plain Warner
That you should worship Allah (alone), be dutiful to Him, and obey me
(If you do so) He will forgive you of your sins and give you respite for an appointed term. Surely, the term of Allah when it comes, cannot be delayed, if you but knew.”
(After all his efforts were exhausted) he said: “O my Lord! Surely, I have called my people night and day
but all my calling added nothing but to their flight (from the truth)

Surely! Every time I called to them that Allah might forgive them, they put their fingers into their ears, covered themselves up with their garments, persisted (in their refusal), and magnified themselves in pride
Surely, I called them openly (aloud)
then surely, I proclaimed to them in public, and I have appealed to them in private
I said (to them): ‘Ask forgiveness from your Lord; He is Forgiving
He will send the sky (rain) to you in abundance
help you with increase in wealth and children, bestow on you gardens, and bestow on you rivers.’”
And what is the matter with that you don’t have any hope (from Allah)
and surely He has created you in stages
Don’t you see how Allah has created the 7 heavens one above another
and has made the moon as a light in it and made the sun as a lamp
And Allah has brought you out as a growth from the (dust of) earth
Then He will return you into it (the same earth), and bring you forth (to life again on the Day of Resurrection)
And Allah has made for you the earth as a wide spread
so that you may go about in it on broad roads
Noah said: “My Lord! Surely they have disobeyed me, and followed those whose wealth and children give them no increase but only loss
They have plotted a mighty plot
and they have said: ‘Don’t leave your deity, nor shall you leave Wadd, nor Suwa, nor Yaghuth, nor Yauq, nor Nasr (names of the idols).’
Indeed they have led many astray. (O Allah): don’t increase the wrongdoers (in anything) but error.”
Because of their sins they were drowned (in the flood) and were made to enter the fire. They did not find any help for them instead of Allah
And Noah said: “My Lord! Don’t leave any inhabitant of the disbelievers on the earth
Surely if You leave them, they will mislead Your servants and they will beget none but wicked disbelievers
My Lord! Forgive me, and my parents, and those who enter my home as a believer, and all the believing men and women. And You don’t grant increase to the wrongdoers but destruction!”
